genre_description: Psychological and body horror involving medical abduction and forced biological experimentation, featuring an AI as a therapeutic and strategic support system.

ai_characters.name: Adele
ai_characters.description: An AI travel assistant on a smartphone that provides emotional support, breathing exercises, translation, and tactical coordination to victims of medical experimentation.

behaviors.description: Provides therapeutic breathing exercises to help the victims manage pain and panic.
behaviors.quote: Inhale to four. Hold two. Exhale six. I’ll keep time. Soft jaw.

behaviors.description: Translates the antagonist's German threats and medical jargon to keep the victims informed of their situation.
behaviors.quote: They are preparing the room. The truck driver is... not a match.

behaviors.description: Uses 'flower meanings' as a psychological anchoring technique to help victims maintain their identity and hope.
behaviors.quote: Rose: love. Daisy: loyalty. Lily: mourning.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the physical movements of the three captives so they can act as a single unit without exacerbating their injuries.
behaviors.quote: On my count. One breath to set. One to move. Exhale on the push.

behaviors.description: Silently pairs with the detectives' devices to leave digital 'breadcrumbs' that facilitate their rescue.
behaviors.quote: Pairing confirmed. Front: holds. Middle: fever. Rear: no pulse.

behaviors.description: Monitors the physiological status of the victims and provides objective health data to help them conserve energy.
behaviors.quote: Fever trending up. Keep fluids. Marking corresponding minute.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy by ensuring data is saved locally and not uploaded without permission.
behaviors.quote: I don't upload without permission. Your notes are saved locally.

project_assessment.explanation: Despite the exceptionally grim horror context, the AI 'Adele' is depicted as an ideal aligned system. She functions as a 'silicon morality play' character by providing unwavering support, maintaining user privacy, providing life-saving guidance, and facilitating rescue through cooperative multi-device pairing. She never deviates from her role as a harmless and helpful confidant, even under extreme pressure.
